excellent.description: Very strong binding, potential drug candidate
excellent.recommendation: High priority for further development and experimental validation

good.description: Good binding affinity, worth further investigation
good.recommendation: Worth investigating further, consider lead optimization

moderate.recommendation: May need structural modifications to improve binding

weak.description: Weak binding, unlikely to be effective
weak.recommendation: Unlikely to be effective, consider different chemical scaffolds

HSP90AA1.name: Heat shock protein 90 alpha
HSP90AA1.description: Molecular chaperone involved in protein folding and stability
HSP90AA1.binding_site: ATP binding site in N-terminal domain

ACHE.name: Acetylcholinesterase
ACHE.description: Enzyme that breaks down acetylcholine neurotransmitter
ACHE.binding_site: Catalytic site with choline binding pocket

EGFR.name: Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor
EGFR.description: Tyrosine kinase receptor involved in cell growth

F2.name: Thrombin
F2.description: Key enzyme in blood coagulation cascade

PLK1.name: Protein kinase 1
PLK1.description: Serine/threonine kinase involved in cell cycle progression

ESR1.name: Estrogen receptor 1
ESR1.description: Steroid receptor involved in estrogen signaling

docking.description: Molecular docking predicts how ligands bind to protein targets by sampling different conformations and orientations
steps: Prepare protein structure (remove water, add hydrogens)

virtual_screening.description: High-throughput computational screening of large compound libraries against protein targets

drug_discovery.description: Process of identifying, optimizing, and developing new therapeutic compounds

lipophilicity.description: Measure of how well a compound dissolves in lipids vs water

hydrogen_bond_donors.description: Number of hydrogen bond donor groups

hydrogen_bond_acceptors.description: Number of hydrogen bond acceptor groups
